about_the_game:
Enjoy freedom in an open world as a wolf, one of nature's most wild and powerful creatures. Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws invites you to an adventure full of mysteries waiting to be discovered in the heart of nature. Determine your own destiny and develop all the skills you need to survive in this dangerous world. Silent Paws is not just a game, it also offers an immersive survival experience integrated with nature.

Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws offers you an open world equipped with realistic 3D graphics. In this world, you will admire the beauties of nature while exploring your surroundings and at the same time look for ways to cope with the challenges you encounter. You can create your own unique character by customizing the physical features of your wolf character. It is in your hands to control every detail from its eyes to its waist, from its chest to its claws. The game is not only visually impressive, but also stands out with its deeply thought-out game mechanics.



Experience a real survival experience with energy, health, hunger and sleep bars. Your energy can run out quickly while running, so you may have to stop and rest. Hunger and sleep are constantly decreasing, so you should use the resources in the environment wisely. In the game, finding food and providing a safe shelter are vital. You can rest using the house given at the beginning or create a safer place by unlocking new houses with the keys you get from the market.

There are 8 different tasks waiting for you in the game. These tasks are of critical importance that will determine the fate of the forest and the village. In order to complete the tasks, you need to not only be brave, but also think strategically. Your wolf character will struggle to survive in this dangerous world together with other wolves in the village. Take the excitement of the game to the peak with various activities such as collecting red meat, breaking chests and winning great prizes. In addition, you can sell them at the market and get more resources by exploring the objects in the environment.

The inventory and market system of the game offers you all the tools you will need during the game. You can speed up your progress in the game by purchasing potions, maps and special items from the market and obtain the items needed to use in the tasks. The map system allows you to mark the areas you want to explore and easily go to that area. This way, you can focus on your goals without getting lost in the game world.

Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws is not just a simulation game; it also offers players an experience that requires patience and strategy, giving them a survival instinct. Developing survival skills, using resources efficiently and exploring your surroundings will be the most important skills in this game. These skills are skills that the player can use in real life. While Wolf Simulator teaches players how to withstand the harsh conditions of nature, it also encourages them to think.

The game's open world offers countless areas waiting to be explored. The forested areas around the village are as fascinating as they are dangerous. Players can find new resources and hidden treasures by exploring different areas on a large map. They can unlock various houses and gain new shelters. In addition, mysterious caves, riversides and many other different areas are waiting for players to explore.

Are you ready to travel to the heart of the wild with Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws? If you are ready, develop your character during the game, be alert to the dangers around you and be the real hero of the forest!

name: Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Survive in a wild world as nature's strongest hunter with Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws! Explore, survive and write your own legend! Join this epic adventure now and become the true hero of the forest.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
